reviews.review: Nem rossz de nagyon ki lehet használni hogy a gyilkos fpsben vand a menekülők pedig tird-person módban és az is nagyon zavaró hogy 4szer vittem valakit a földre és a végén kikúszott mert nem vettem fel egyből ahogy földre vittem. Gyilkosnak lenni rohadt nehéz menekülőnek pedig ezerszer könnyebb ki tud nézni fal mögül és az a mozgás amit levágnak futás közben az halál + még mindent amit lehet az arcodra csapnak és bedobja az animációt akkor is ha kikerülöd. Ez a játék már nem az ami régen volt. Elbaszták és már egy szar.

Hra je vcelku zábavná. Má světlé, ale i tmavé stránky. Tmavých je možná i více. Zábavná je, pokud dostanete inteligentní team a proti vám je killer, který se nebojí panicky o prohru. To co ale dělá tuhle hru nehratelnou a nudnou je pak ta část, kdy dostáváte furt ty samé killery a velmi špatné hráče. Svatý případ je Babba aka Bubba a jeho basement. Ten je pak schopen vás sledovat celou hru a nemá kousek páteře ani sebeúcty. Možná je jen mentálně zaostalý, ale to se nedovíme. Jeho motorovka (startuje se velmi krátce asi hybrid) a kvíkání je pak dosti protivné. Doktor, legion, nurse a Wraith (zvonek) jsou pak monotónní a otravní, pokud je dostáváte furt dokola. Camp, výsměch a totální sprosťárny jsou pro killery naprosto normální. Jsou schopni patrolovat 2 generátory jen proto, aby hra byla dlouhá, nudná a aby hlavně neprošel ani jeden člověk : ). Hitboxy jsou velmi špatné a palety jsou taky občas velmi inteligentní.

Hra asi dobrá, ale pokud dostanete tryharda tak to raději leavněte.

Great game but with inherit flaws thanks to extremely slow and lazy developers who make bad choices. The game is also unfortunately suffering from spaghetti code issues. The recent Resident Evil chapter has highlighted just how lazy and bad the devs can be. Glitches and bugs out the ass, the new map has been disabled and the devs have made some extremely poor choices regarding their priorities. 

There have been talks of a boycott regarding the game, but the devs hold a monopoly on the genre that Dead By Daylight falls in, so a boycott is literally not going to do anything. I'm making this review though just to let people know that before they buy, expect an EXTREMELY grindy game that has very slow and careless developers who often don't care about what the community thinks or wants.

Got the game on sale for 13 bucks. Honestly, the game feels like it's worth that much.
It's really fun, but can get repetitive regardless of the different variations of maps, etc. The mechanics are always the same -- repair generators for survivors, find and hook survivors as the killer.

It'd be cool if they added dynamic puzzles that you have to solve on the fly. I think the pressure would be a lot better than holding the left mouse button and looking around to see if the killer is coming. Or, as a killer, you can compete with the hooked survivor via a QTE mini-game. If the killer wins, the survivor is eliminated, if the survivor wins, the killer is stunned for 20 seconds and the survivor is set free.

Long story short, the game is a 8/10 - an original concept. Buy it while on sale though because there isn't much content to consume.

Game has a horrible issue with survivors using voice chat which is by definition cheating (Using external software to gain a competitive advantage). The game was not designed with a VOIP, furthermore the devs have said they won't add one. That is because it breaks the game. It is a stealth prey/hunter game where making noises alerts the killer. You are separated and the only in game communication you have is essentially pointing or beckoning SILENTLY (because, again, noise alerts the killer). Yet many MANY players party as a group and are in a discord call. Whenever they see the killer they tell everyone what the killer is doing and where they are so they can all avoid him. This is inherently game-breaking. Some players will say the dev's said they are fine with it, but that's because they don't know how to/are too lazy to fix it. The negative review is because the devs refuse to crack down on cheating and instead turn a blind eye because they are too lazy or incompetent to fix it. Otherwise a fun game. (PS if you play killer and people join at the same time, leave lobby, they're most definitely in a party and more than likely using voice chat to cheat.)

Хочешь попробовать манькая покачать Сосамба, хочешь попробовать нового маньяка сосамба, решил поиграть за выжевшего - сосмба будет чел с фул перками и едой.  КАК В ЭТО ИГРАТЬ НОВИЧКУ?!

This game is absolutely cracked. I have at least 600 hours played across several platforms. It has its ups and downs, unbalanced nerfing and/or buffing from time to time. Some killers are OP but those matches are usually still fun. Only new killers will hook you and then camp there (which takes away a lot of points the killer could get so its a lose-lose). Late game when you are a high rank the killers are really good but its almost always fun, the toxic killers come every once in awhile. The perks you have unlocked are based on who you have leveled up, 3 unique perks to each character there is to unlock OR buy. It does take a considerable about of time to unlock someone for free, but considering you can only hold 4 perks at a time, you will only want to level up the people who have perks that you want specifically. A word to the wise: level up the people who have the perks you want FIRST - then level up the person you want to LOOK LIKE. it will be cheaper in the long run and you will get the perks you want, on the person you want them on faster.

The game is amazing but has a very annoying grind.

I'm going to keep this short. For a game that has been out for 5 years, and I have seen grow since Beta. It still has the same problems as it had 5 years ago. 
1.) Requires DLC in order to have some form of fun in the game, the base game is very bare bones.
2.) Bugs, bugs, bugs galore, with every patch there are more bugs that make it worse for players on all platforms.
3.) Incompetent developers; devs choose to ignore issues that have been in the game for months and instead push for skins in the item shop and milk this game for its cosmetics.
4.) Graphics, for a 2016 title, the graphics were acceptable at the time, they are still as bad since then. Developers will not update graphics without breaking half the games code.
5.) Terrible optimization, good luck running this on anything other than low graphics. 
6.) Censorship, for an M rated game you cannot say potty words despite there being potty words in the game already.
7.) The community, toxic and every game will end up disappointing some player and calling you a slur. 

This game is only fun if you have friends to play with, to learn this game requires a lot of money and time. Spend it elsewhere on developers who actually care about their players instead of laying bandaids on top of huge issues.
Before i played Dead by Daylight, i had a small wee-wee, no friends, no girlfriend, depression,and absolutely no life. These things haven't changed, but the game is pretty good.

My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, 'If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately.'. Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me- 'Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed. At 22, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because playing against dead by daylight bubba gave me cancer anyway.
I've played 200 hours of this game and I'm still not sure if i've even had fun

Denerwuje nawet Szeregowego, o Morcie nie wspomne... 
Mnóstwo bugów, palety zamiast pomagać utrudniają, a hitboxy to śmiech na sali. 

Jednak magia tej gry jest uzależniająca i chociaż czasem mam ochotę wyrzucić kompa przez okno, to kocham tą gierkę.

Balansie gry -  tragedia, szkoda gadać. 

Mati weź się człowieku do roboty. 

Czy polecam? Jeśli masz nerwy ze stali, to chyba tak. Gracie na własną odpowiedzialność. Jeśli zagrasz, to nie bądź toksyczny, lej na noeda, nie camp, nie tunneluj się i nie tibagguj. 

Pozdrawiam bardzo serdecznie i usuńcie bliźniaki i spirit.

I have greatly enjoyed playing Dead by Daylight thus far and I look forward to more content from them. I think it's worth the cost and I have really enjoyed getting to use characters from my favorite franchises. :D
